alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 3:05AM MDT until March 16 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow continues. Additional snow accumulation of up to 1 inch possible, mainly at elevations above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Snowy Range. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Mountain travel will be hazardous due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Outdoor recreation could become dangerous to those caught unprepared for hazardous winter conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
